TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ｍami, title = Ｍami, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ｍami} }

S.FORM: Ｍami Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Ｍami a niyaro', 30 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 99 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 87% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 86 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 13% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 13 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal83%, roma4%.

Ｍami Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Ｍami a niyaro', 30 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 99 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 87% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 86 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 13% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 13 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal83%, roma4%.
